name: Nullysun (itch)
description:
Roll! Fly! Dodge! Take part in unique adventure and explore different locations!

Do you want to ride a firecracker or stun moldings?

Nullysun is:
- Different locations and secret levels
- Many kinds of transport: one-ball-bands, flyrons etc.
- Odd characters and odd world
- Normal mode and hard mode
- Unpredictable plot

- New friends... and new foes!
- Funny cutscenes!

Easy to play but hard to beat! Could you compete all amazing levels?

Have fun!
